item.title: Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
item.description: At least one Mega Millions player has plenty of dough to ring in the New Year after drawing the winning number.

item.title: Another jackpot surpasses $1 billion. Is this the new normal?
US teacher jailed in Russia is formally designated as wrongfully detained
